title: 103: The Trouble With The Troubled Teen Industry | Lee Veltman
description:
Who would have ever thought that the person to blow the lid off of the very secretive and devious Troubled Teen industry would be celebrity socialite and amateur porn actress, Paris Hilton?

Researcher Lee Veltman spent a significant portion of his early years trapped in the boarding schools and teen camps that were established to deal with the rising problem of juvenile delinquents and he breaks down how these operations are allowed to continue with questionable oversight.

Controlled Demolition on Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08M21XKJ5
